values.name: derived-from
values.description: The information in the target object is based on information from the source object.

values.name: duplicate-of
values.description: The referenced source and target objects are semantically duplicates of each other.

values.name: related-to
values.description: The referenced source is related to the target object.

values.name: connected-to
values.description: The referenced source is connected to the target object.

values.name: contains
values.description: The references source is containing the target object.

values.name: resolved-to
values.description: The referenced source is resolved to the target object.

values.name: attributed-to
values.description: This referenced source is attributed to the target object.

values.name: targets
values.description: This relationship describes that the source object targets the target object.

values.name: uses
values.description: This relationship describes the use by the source object of the target object.

values.name: indicates
values.description: This relationships describes that the source object indicates the target object.

values.name: mitigates
values.description: This relationship describes a source object which mitigates the target object.

values.name: variant-of
values.description: This relationship describes a source object which is a variant of the target object

values.name: impersonates
values.description: This relationship describe a source object which impersonates the target object

values.name: authored-by
values.description: This relationship describes the author of a specific object.

values.name: located
values.description: This relationship describes the location (of any type) of a specific object.

values.name: included-in
values.description: This relationship describes an object included in another object.

values.name: analysed-with
values.description: This relationship describes an object analysed by another object.

values.name: claimed-by
values.description: This relationship describes an object claimed by another object.

values.name: communicates-with
values.description: This relationship describes an object communicating with another object.

values.name: dropped-by
values.description: This relationship describes an object dropped by another object.

values.name: drops
values.description: This relationship describes an object which drops another object

values.name: executed-by
values.description: This relationship describes an object executed by another object.

values.name: affects
values.description: This relationship describes an object affected by another object.

values.name: beacons-to
values.description: This relationship describes an object beaconing to another object.

values.name: abuses
values.description: This relationship describes an object which abuses another object.

values.name: exfiltrates-to
values.description: This relationship describes an object exfiltrating to another object.

values.name: identifies
values.description: This relationship describes an object which identifies another object.

values.name: intercepts
values.description: This relationship describes an object which intercepts another object.

values.name: calls
values.description: This relationship describes an object which calls another objects.

values.name: detected-as
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is detected as another object.

values.name: followed-by
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is followed by another object. This can be used when a time reference is missing but a sequence is known.

values.name: preceding-by
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is preceded by another object. This can be used when a time reference is missing but a sequence is known.

values.name: triggers
values.description: This relationship describes an object which triggers another object.

values.name: vulnerability-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is a vulnerability of another object.

values.name: works-like
values.description: This relationship describes an object which works like another object.

values.name: seller-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is selling another object.

values.name: seller-on
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is selling on another object.

values.name: trying-to-obtain-the-exploit
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is trying to obtain the exploit described by another object

values.name: used-by
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is used by another object.

values.name: affiliated
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is affiliated with another object.

values.name: alleged-founder-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is the alleged founder of another object.

values.name: attacking-other-group
values.description: This relationship describes an object which attacks another object.

values.name: belongs-to
values.description: This relationship describes an object which belongs to another object.

values.name: business-relations
values.description: This relationship describes an object which has business relations with another object.

values.name: claims-to-be-the-founder-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which claims to be the founder of another object.

values.name: cooperates-with
values.description: This relationship describes an object which cooperates with another object.

values.name: former-member-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is a former member of another object.

values.name: successor-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is a successor of another object.

values.name: has-joined
values.description: This relationship describes an object which has joined another object.

values.name: member-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is a member of another object.

values.name: primary-member-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is a primary member of another object.

values.name: administrator-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is an administrator of another object.

values.name: is-in-relation-with
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is in relation with another object,

values.name: provide-support-to
values.description: This relationship describes an object which provides support to another object.

values.name: regional-branch
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is a regional branch of another object.

values.name: similar
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is similar to another object.

values.name: subgroup
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is a subgroup of another object.

values.name: suspected-link
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is suspected to be linked with another object.

values.name: same-as
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is the same as another object.

values.name: creator-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is the creator of another object.

values.name: developer-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is a developer of another object.

values.name: uses-for-recon
values.description: This relationship describes an object which uses another object for recon.

values.name: operator-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which is an operator of another object.

values.name: overlaps
values.description: This relationship describes an object which overlaps another object.

values.name: owner-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which owns another object.

values.name: publishes-method-for
values.description: This relationship describes an object which publishes method for another object.

values.name: recommends-use-of
values.description: This relationship describes an object which recommends the use of another object.

values.name: released-source-code
values.description: This relationship describes an object which released source code of another object.

values.name: released
values.description: This relationship describes an object which release another object.

description: Default type of relationships in MISP objects.
name: relationships
